document.full_text: the capitals have yet to settle on a starting goaltender for the playoffs, with michal neuvirth and semyon varlamov both vying for the job and their hottest one, braden holtby, back in the minors.
document.title: capitals' playoff quandary: who's in goal?
lines_and_colors: the capitals have yet to settle on a starting goaltender for the playoffs, with michal neuvirth and semyon varlamov both vying for the job and their hottest one, braden holtby, back in the minors.
